page.title: 14Robert Winters. Part Two.
page.content: Robert's teacher is called Mrs. Marcroft. His favourite subjects are writing stories and reading books. He likes sport and plays in defence in the school football team. His favourite team is Manchester United. School finishes at half past three and he gets home at four o'clock. The first thing he does when he gets home is to throw off his shoes, get changed and go into the living-room with a drink to watch children's television. After watching television he goes to feed his many pets. These are a goat, three rabbits, two dogs, nine fishes and a cat. Most evenings he makes Lego models and plastic aeroplanes. He also collects badges and plays with his train set. On Thursday evening he goes to the 3rd. Gainsborough Cubs Pack at White's Wood Lane. {See next page.
